chemaxon.struc
Class CNode

java.lang.Object
  chemaxon.struc.CNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MolAtom
public abstract class CNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

Node in a chemical graph.

Version:
4.0, 05/09/2005
Author:
Peter Csizmadia, Szabolcs Csepregi
See Also:

haveSimilarEdges

public boolean haveSimilarEdges(CNode a)
Checks if two nodes have similar edges. Two nodes have similar edges if for each edge ei of the first node, there is a corresponding edge ej of the other node with "equal properties".

Returns:
true if they have similar edges, false otherwise
Since:
Marvin 3.4.1, 07/06/2004
See Also:
CEdge.haveEqualProperties(CEdge)

haveEqualProperties

public boolean haveEqualProperties(CNode node)
Checks if two nodes have the same properties. The default implementation always returns true.

Returns:
true they have the same properties, false otherwise
Since:
Marvin 3.4.1, 07/06/2004
